member.name: T:AudioClickRepair.Processing.FastBurgAlgorithm64
member.summary: Fast implimentation of Burg algorithm for real signals. For details see paper A Fast Implementation of Burg’s Method by Koen Vos. FastBurgAlgorithm64 uses internal variables of type double

member.name: F:AudioClickRepair.Processing.FastBurgAlgorithm64._absolutePosition
member.summary: Position in x_inputSignal that we need prediction for.

member.name: F:AudioClickRepair.Processing.FastBurgAlgorithm64._deltaRAndAProduct
member.summary: Product of deltaR matrix and a_predictionCoefs

member.name: M:AudioClickRepair.Processing.FastBurgAlgorithm64.Train(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Calculates prediction coefficients for one sample using CPU
member.param: Position in inputSignal that we need prediction for. Must be greater than historyLengthSamples
Number of prediction coefficients that will be calculated. Greater number gives more accurate prediction but takes more time to calculate
Number of samples that will be used to calculate prediction coefficients

member.name: M:AudioClickRepair.Processing.FastBurgAlgorithm64.CreateInternalVariables
member.summary: Creates internal variables with desirable length

member.name: M:AudioClickRepair.Processing.FastBurgAlgorithm64.GetForwardPrediction
member.summary: Returns forward prediction based on prediction coefficients that were previously calculated with Train() method

member.name: M:AudioClickRepair.Processing.FastBurgAlgorithm64.GetBackwardPrediction
member.summary: Returns backward prediction based on prediction coefficients that were previously calculated with Train() method

member.name: M:AudioClickRepair.Processing.FastBurgAlgorithm64.GetPredictionCoefs
member.summary: Returns prediction coefficients that were previously calculated with Train() method

member.name: M:AudioClickRepair.Processing.FastBurgAlgorithm64.GetReflectionCoefs
member.summary: Returns prediction coefficients that were previously calculated with Train() method

member.name: M:AudioClickRepair.Processing.FastBurgAlgorithm64.UpdateG
member.summary: Updates vector g. For details see step 7 of algorithm on page 3 of A Fast Implementation of Burg’s Method by Koen Vos

member.name: M:AudioClickRepair.Processing.FastBurgAlgorithm64.ComputeDeltaRMultByA
member.summary: Calculates vector deltaRAndAProduct. For details see step 6 of algorithm on page 3 of A Fast Implementation of Burg’s Method by Koen Vos

member.name: M:AudioClickRepair.Processing.FastBurgAlgorithm64.UpdateR
member.summary: Updates vector r. For details see step 5 of algorithm on page 3 of A Fast Implementation of Burg’s Method by Koen Vos

member.name: M:AudioClickRepair.Processing.FastBurgAlgorithm64.UpdatePredictionCoefs
member.summary: Updates vector of prediction coefficients. For details see step 2 of algorithm on page 3 of A Fast Implementation of Burg’s Method by Koen Vos

member.name: M:AudioClickRepair.Processing.FastBurgAlgorithm64.ComputeReflectionCoef
member.summary: Computes vector of reflection coefficients. For details see step 1 of algorithm on page 3 of A Fast Implementation of Burg’s Method by Koen Vos

member.name: M:AudioClickRepair.Processing.FastBurgAlgorithm64.JinversOrder(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Inverts index to flip a vector insted of multiplication with J matrix. For details see (12) on page 2 of A Fast Implementation of Burg’s Method by Koen Vos
member.param: from 0 to max
positive number

member.name: M:AudioClickRepair.Processing.FastBurgAlgorithm64.Initialization
member.summary: Initializes i_iterationCounter and vectors. For details see step 0 of algorithm on page 3 of A Fast Implementation of Burg’s Method by Koen Vos

member.name: M:AudioClickRepair.Processing.FastBurgAlgorithm64.FindAutocorrelations
member.summary: Calculates autocorrelations. For details see step 0 of algorithm on page 3 of A Fast Implementation of Burg’s Method by Koen Vos

member.summary: IAnalyzer interface.

member.summary: Returns size of input data array needed to perform calculations.

member.name: M:AudioClickRepair.Processing.IAnalyzer.GetDefaultResult
member.summary: Returns default result. Can be used if calculation can not be done.

member.name: M:AudioClickRepair.Processing.IAnalyzer.GetResult(System.Double[])
member.summary: Returns result of calculation.
